the requisite fame, glamour, and pedigree, Caroline Kennedy seemed poised to fill the void left by Hillary Clinton 's departure. Kirsten Gillibrand , by contrast, was an obscure one-term House member from a conservative, rural district. She faced prejudice not just as a woman but as an upstater, says Bob Dylan , a top Democratic fundraiser in New York. The World Youth Peace Summit brings scholar-athletes and scholar-artists from all over the world to Connecticut, so it truly is a natural partnership and we are thrilled to have the opportunity to incorporate the mission of the United Nations with the Summit's goals of promoting peace through athletics and the arts.
